name: Bloodlines
description:
Summon the Blood God!

Drag bloodlines with your mouse over your cultists to lead the way
Rescue other cultists to summon the Blood God! 
Don’t die and don’t run out of blood! 

Pan and scroll with mouse

 Attack Hunters for blood by standing close to them 

Right click on a cultist to sacrifice him when you run out of blood

Middle mouse to center on cultist 

R to restart game 

Esc to quit

Space to skip intro

Have fun!

Made for Ludum Dare 44: Life is a currency

Music by: http://www.jellevanaanholt.nl/
